main event: An object was observed on radar performing unusual aerobatic maneuvers over Bakersfield, California.
interesting points: The object was tracked at an altitude of approximately 25,000 feet for 1 1/2 hours,The maneuvers performed by the object were not typical for a standard military aircraft,The observation was made at approximately 20 miles away from the radar site,The object was described as a round grapefruit shape and was bright in color,The weather conditions were clear with no cloud cover.
witness description: no eyewitnesses reported; observation was made via radar
